title: Create standalone HTML page

requirements.text: Generate a standalone HTML file that includes all necessary inline CSS and JavaScript, making it fully self-contained and functional without external dependencies

quotes: can you create a real html for me

acceptanceCriteria: HTML file contains inline <style> tags with all necessary CSS
HTML file contains inline <script> tags with all necessary JavaScript
File can be opened directly in a browser without a build process
All functionality works without external file dependencies

requirements.text: Include proper HTML5 document structure with DOCTYPE, head section containing meta tags for viewport and character encoding, and semantic body elements
acceptanceCriteria: Meta viewport tag configured for responsive design

requirements.text: Create a functional demo page that showcases the Neroxa AI application's core features (chat, math solver, media generation, translation, music, art, code generation, games) in an interactive format
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays navigation or tabs for different features
Each feature section is visually distinct and labeled
Page maintains visual consistency across sections

constraints: Must be a single, self-contained HTML file
No external CSS or JavaScript file dependencies
Must work without a build process or bundler
Should maintain the existing dark theme aesthetic
